items.name: Megalomaniac
explicitMods: Adds 4 Passive Skills
Added Small Passive Skills grant Nothing
1 Added Passive Skill is Advance Guard
1 Added Passive Skill is Burning Bright
1 Added Passive Skill is Mortifying Aspect
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: If you're going to act like you're better than everyone else, make sure you are.

items.name: Elegant Hubris
explicitMods:
Commissioned 76300 coins to commemorate Caspiro
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Eternal Empire
Historic
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: They believed themselves better than the past, but that confidence brought about nightmare.

items.name: Soul Hope
enchantMods: 2 Added Passive Skills are Jewel Sockets
Added Small Passive Skills grant: 12% increased Fire Damage
explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: 1% increased Attack and Cast Speed with Fire Skills
1 Added Passive Skill is Burning Bright
1 Added Passive Skill is Prismatic Heart
1 Added Passive Skill is Widespread Destruction
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Maelström Curio
enchantMods: 1 Added Passive Skill is a Jewel Socket
Added Small Passive Skills grant: 12% increased Burning Damage
explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +3% to all Elemental Resistances
Added Small Passive Skills also grant: Regenerate 0.15% of Life per Second
1 Added Passive Skill is Flow of Life
1 Added Passive Skill is Smoking Remains
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Forbidden Flesh
explicitMods: Allocates Hinekora, Death's Fury if you have the matching modifier on Forbidden Flame
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: The bodies of those wholly subsumed by the Tangle
continue to merge and mutate and cry out for release...

items.name: Phoenix Glimmer
enchantMods: 1 Added Passive Skill is a Jewel Socket
Added Small Passive Skills grant: 12% increased Burning Damage
explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +4% to Chaos Resistance
Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +3% to Lightning Resistance
1 Added Passive Skill is Cremator
1 Added Passive Skill is Student of Decay
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Watcher's Eye
explicitMods: 6% increased maximum Energy Shield
5% increased maximum Life
6% increased maximum Mana
+19% to Damage over Time Multiplier while affected by Malevolence
1.45% of Fire Damage Leeched as Life while affected by Anger
14% increased Life Recovery Rate while affected by Vitality
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: One by one, they stood their ground against a creature
they had no hope of understanding, let alone defeating,
and one by one, they became a part of it.

items.name: Forbidden Flame
explicitMods: Allocates Hinekora, Death's Fury if you have the matching modifier on Forbidden Flesh
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: The minds of those studied utterly by the Cleansing Fire
continue to think and dream and beg for silence...

items.name: Gale Splinter
implicitMods: Corrupted Blood cannot be inflicted on you
explicitMods: 16% increased Global Physical Damage
+6% to Damage over Time Multiplier
15% increased Fire Damage
4% reduced Mana Cost of Skills
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
